    HIV.C.DE42Yes, I want to become pregnantPregnancy intention in serodiscordant partnerships - Yes, I want to become pregnant
    HIV.C.DE43I'm OK either wayPregnancy intention in serodiscordant partnerships - I'm OK either way
    HIV.C.DE44No, I don't want to become pregnantPregnancy intention in serodiscordant partnerships - No, I don't want to become pregnant
    HIV.C.DE45UnsurePregnancy intention in serodiscordant partnerships - Unsure
